title: Combat Achievements/Free-to-play

properties.name: description
properties.value: This article contains Combat Achievements that can be completed on free-to-play worlds.

content:
This article contains Combat Achievements that can be completed on free-to-play worlds.

Players without membership cannot claim any rewards or fully complete any tier of the achievements.

Contents

  • 1 Requirements
    • 1.1 Items
    • 1.2 Skills
    • 1.3 Quests
    • 1.4 Enemies to defeat
  • 2 Completable tasks
    • 2.1 Free-to-play exclusive tasks
    • 2.2 Free-to-play accessible tasks
  • 3 Uncompletable tasks
  • 4 Trivia
  • 5 Changes
  • 6 See also

Requirements[edit | edit source]

Completing every available task on free-to-play worlds requires the following:

Items[edit | edit source]

  • Giant key for every kill attempt at Obor, minimum of 5
  • Mossy key for every kill attempt at Bryophyta, minimum of 5
  • Runes for Bind or Snare
  • Silverlight
  • Axe, can be obtained during the Bryophyta fight

Skills[edit | edit source]

  • 40 Prayer for Protect from Missiles
  • 20 Magic for Bind ( 50 recommended for Snare)

Quests[edit | edit source]

  • Demon Slayer partial completion up to obtaining Silverlight

Enemies to defeat[edit | edit source]

  • Bryophyta
  • Greater demon
  • Obor

Completable tasks[edit | edit source]

There are 14 tasks in total that can be completed on free-to-play worlds.

Kills of Obor and Bryophyta prior to Combat Achievements release will count towards completion of Kill Count tasks which will be updated upon first entering the Combat Achievements interface.

Free-to-play exclusive tasks[edit | edit source]

There are 2 tasks that must be completed on a free-to-play world.

Tier Monster Name Description Type Requirements
Easy Obor Fighting as Intended Kill Obor on a free to play world. Restriction Giant key
Easy Bryophyta Fighting as Intended II Kill Bryophyta on a free to play world. Restriction Mossy key

Free-to-play accessible tasks[edit | edit source]

There are 12 additional tasks that can be completed on free-to-play worlds, including 7 from the Easy tier and 5 from the Medium tier.

Tier Monster Name Description Type Requirements Notes
Easy Bryophyta Preparation Is Key Kill Bryophyta without suffering any poison damage. Perfection Mossy key Bryophyta doesn't apply poison on free-to-play worlds so this task automatically completes after any kill. Antipoison is not required.
Easy Bryophyta Protection from Moss Kill Bryophyta with the Protect from Magic prayer active. Mechanical Mossy key

37 Prayer

Easy Bryophyta Bryophyta Novice Kill Bryophyta once. Kill count Mossy key
Easy Greater demon A Greater Foe Kill a Greater Demon. Kill count Only located at the Demonic Ruins in the Wilderness.
Easy Greater demon Not So Great After All Finish off a Greater Demon with a demonbane weapon. Restriction Silverlight Silverlight is a demonbane weapon. The last damage must be dealt with Silverlight.
Easy Obor Sleeping Giant Kill Obor whilst he is immobilized. Mechanical Giant key

Nature runes

Earth runes

Water runes

20 Magic

Elemental staves are recommended. Bind, requiring 20 Magic, can be used to complete the challenge, although Snare, requiring 50 Magic, is recommended instead.
Easy Obor Obor Novice Kill Obor once. Kill count Giant key
Medium Bryophyta Quick Cutter Kill all 3 of Bryophyta's growthlings within 3 seconds of the first one dying. Mechanical Mossy key

Axe

An axe is obtainable during the fight. Damage every growthling to 0 or 1 Hitpoints, and use an axe on each to finish them. Growthlings spawn multiple times during the fight, allowing for multiple attempts, but they only need to be killed this way once to complete this task.
Medium Bryophyta Bryophyta Champion Kill Bryophyta 5 times. Kill count Mossy key × 5
Medium Obor Squashing the Giant Kill Obor without taking any damage off prayer. Perfection Giant key

40 Prayer

Activate Protect from Missiles and use Bind or Snare to avoid melee attacks. Optionally, use Protect from Melee unlocked at 43 Prayer to protect from Obor's melee attacks, although note that keeping distance at all times is a more reliable way to complete the task. Technically completable without Prayer, but it's very diffcult due to Obor's considerable accuracy.
Medium Obor Back to the Wall Kill Obor without being pushed back more than one square by his knockback attack. Mechanical Giant key Stand against one of the walls. Use Bind or Snare to avoid melee attacks altogether.
Medium Obor Obor Champion Kill Obor 5 times. Kill count Giant key × 5

Uncompletable tasks[edit | edit source]

The following tasks are related to free-to-play monsters or bosses, but cannot be completed on free-to-play worlds.

Tier Monster Name Description Type Notes
Easy Bryophyta A Slow Death Kill Bryophyta with either poison or venom being the final source of damage. Restriction Poison and venom does not work in free-to-play worlds.
Easy None Into the Den of Giants Kill a Hill Giant, Moss Giant and Fire Giant in the Giant Cave within the Shayzien region. Kill count The Giants' Den is located in the members-only region of Shayzien.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Every task related to Obor and greater demons can be completed without membership.
  • Only 12 tasks can be completed without access to the protection prayers. Protection from Moss is locked behind Protect from Magic, while Squashing the Giant requires at least Protect from Missiles to reliably complete the task.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
4 August 2021
(update)
  • The number of kills required to complete the Bryophyta Champion task was reduced from 10 to 5.
  • The number of kills required to complete the Obor Champion task was reduced from 10 to 5.
28 July 2021
(update)
  • Not So Great After All can now be completed with Silverlight and other demonbane weapons rather than just Arclight. This task is now completable on a free-to-play world.
  • Squashing the Giant now requires never taking damage from Obor without the appropriate protection prayer rather than taking no damage at all during the entire fight.

See also[edit | edit source]

  • Collection log/Free-to-play
  • Quests/Free-to-play

rawContent:
[[File:Combat achievements detail.png|left|150px]]
This article contains [[Combat Achievements]] that can be completed on [[free-to-play]] worlds.

Players without [[membership]] cannot claim any rewards or fully complete any tier of the achievements.

==Requirements==
Completing every available task on [[free-to-play]] worlds requires the following:

===Items===
{{Checklist|
* {{plink|Giant key}} for every kill attempt at [[Obor]], minimum of 5
* {{plink|Mossy key}} for every kill attempt at [[Bryophyta]], minimum of 5
* {{plinkp|Water rune}} {{plinkp|Earth rune}} {{plinkp|Nature rune}} [[Runes]] for {{plink|Bind}} or {{plink|Snare}}
* {{plink|Silverlight}}
* {{plink|Axe|pic=Bronze axe}}, can be obtained during the [[Bryophyta]] fight
}}

===Skills===
{{Checklist|
* {{SCP|Prayer|40|link=yes}} for {{plink|Protect from Missiles}}
* {{SCP|Magic|20|link=yes}} for {{plink|Bind}} ({{SCP|Magic|50}} recommended for {{plink|Snare}})
}}

===Quests===
{{Checklist|
* {{SCP|Quest}} [[Demon Slayer]] partial completion up to obtaining {{plink|Silverlight}}
}}

===Enemies to defeat===
{{Checklist|
* [[Bryophyta]]
* [[Greater demon]]
* [[Obor]]
}}

==Completable tasks==
There are 14 tasks in total that can be completed on [[free-to-play]] worlds.

Kills of [[Obor]] and [[Bryophyta]] prior to [[Combat Achievements]] release will count towards completion of Kill Count tasks which will be updated upon first entering the Combat Achievements interface.

===Free-to-play exclusive tasks===
There are 2 tasks that '''must''' be completed on a [[free-to-play]] world.

|Restriction
|{{plink|Mossy key}}
|}

===Free-to-play accessible tasks===
There are 12 additional tasks that '''can''' be completed on [[free-to-play]] worlds, including 7 from the [[Combat Achievements/Easy|Easy]] tier and 5 from the [[Combat Achievements/Medium|Medium]] tier.

Optionally, use {{plink|Protect from Melee}} unlocked at {{SCP|Prayer|43|link=yes}} to protect from Obor's melee attacks, although note that keeping distance at all times is a more reliable way to complete the task. Technically completable without [[Prayer]], but it's very diffcult due to Obor's considerable accuracy.

==Uncompletable tasks==
The following tasks are related to [[free-to-play]] monsters or [[boss]]es, but cannot be completed on [[free-to-play]] worlds.

{|class="wikitable"
!colspan=2|Tier
!Monster
!Name
!Description
!Type
!Notes
|-
|{{plinkt|Combat Achievements/Easy|txt=Easy|pic=Combat Achievements - easy tier icon}}
|[[Bryophyta]]
|[[A Slow Death]]
|Kill [[Bryophyta]] with either [[poison]] or [[venom]] being the final source of damage.
|Restriction
|[[Poison]] and [[venom]] does not work in [[free-to-play]] worlds.
|-
|{{plinkt|Combat Achievements/Easy|txt=Easy|pic=Combat Achievements - easy tier icon}}
|None
|[[Into the Den of Giants]]
|Kill a [[Hill Giant]], [[Moss Giant]] and [[Fire Giant]] in the [[Giants' Den|Giant Cave]] within the [[Shayzien]] region.
|Kill count
|The [[Giants' Den]] is located in the [[members]]-only region of [[Shayzien]].
|}

==Trivia==
* Every task related to [[Obor]] and [[greater demon]]s can be completed without [[membership]].
* Only 12 tasks can be completed without access to the [[protection prayers]]. [[Protection from Moss]] is locked behind [[Protect from Magic]], while [[Squashing the Giant]] requires at least [[Protect from Missiles]] to reliably complete the task.

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 4 August 2021
|update = New Client Features: Milestone 2
|change =
* The number of kills required to complete the [[Bryophyta Champion]] task was reduced from 10 to 5.
* The number of kills required to complete the [[Obor Champion]] task was reduced from 10 to 5. 
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 28 July 2021
|update = A Night At The Theatre Rework
|change =
* [[Not So Great After All]] can now be completed with [[Silverlight]] and other [[demonbane]] weapons rather than just [[Arclight]]. This task is now completable on a [[free-to-play]] world.
* [[Squashing the Giant]] now requires never taking damage from [[Obor]] without the appropriate [[protection prayer]] rather than taking no damage at all during the entire fight.
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}
